goals_001.GoalDescription: Take a picture of you planting a tree and post it to gain marks!

goals_002.GoalDescription: Pick up trash from the beach to earn points!

goals_003.GoalDescription: Collect and recycle at least 10 bottles to earn aura points.

goals_004.GoalDescription: Use reusable bags for shopping for a week.

goals_005.GoalDescription: Turn off the faucet while brushing your teeth for a week.

goals_006.GoalDescription: Ride your bike for 5 miles to reduce your carbon footprint.

goals_007.GoalDescription: Avoid using plastic for one week and track your progress.

goals_008.GoalDescription: Start composting organic waste for a week.

goals_009.GoalDescription: Use public transportation for a week to reduce pollution.

goals_010.GoalDescription: Plant at least 5 plants in your garden this season.

goals_011.GoalDescription: Switch to digital notes instead of using paper.

goals_012.GoalDescription: Install solar-powered lights at home for a month.

goals_013.GoalDescription: Buy your groceries from a local farmerâ€™s market.

goals_014.GoalDescription: Wear second-hand clothing or eco-friendly fabrics for a month.

goals_015.GoalDescription: Bike to work for a week instead of driving.

goals_016.GoalDescription: Volunteer for a local community cleanup event.

goals_017.GoalDescription: Complete a DIY project using recycled materials.

goals_018.GoalDescription: Plant a tree in your local park.

goals_019.GoalDescription: Declutter your home and donate items you no longer need.

goals_020.GoalDescription: Carpool to work with friends or colleagues for a week.

goals_021.GoalDescription: Use a reusable water bottle for a month instead of plastic bottles.

goals_022.GoalDescription: Upcycle old clothes into something new.

goals_023.GoalDescription: Join an environmental group or club at school or work.

goals_024.GoalDescription: Donate unused items to a local charity.

goals_025.GoalDescription: Switch to eco-friendly cleaning products for your home.

goals_026.GoalDescription: Start a community garden in your neighborhood.

goals_027.GoalDescription: Unplug appliances when not in use for a month.

goals_028.GoalDescription: Build a composting bin for your home garden.

goals_029.GoalDescription: Travel using public transport or bike instead of driving.

goals_030.GoalDescription: Shop from sustainable and eco-friendly brands for a month.
